programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
programme.desc: (2019) Quentin Tarantino's darkly comic drama set in 60s LA, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Brad Pitt and Margot Robbie. A failing actor's world collides with the Manson Family.

programme.title: Slow West
programme.desc: (2015) Violent offbeat western starring Kodi Smit-McPhee and Michael Fassbender. A 16-year-old Scottish lad travels to 1870s Colorado on the trail of his true love.

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: A Christmas Carol
programme.desc: (1984) George C Scott stars in Clive Donner's adaptation of Charles Dickens' classic festive fantasy. The miserly curmudgeon Ebenezer Scrooge is visited by three ghosts of Christmas.

programme.title: Dragonball Evolution
programme.desc: (2009) Martial arts adventure. Justin Chatwin stars as the leader of a mystical band of warriors who are out to save the world from the ancient demon Lord Piccolo. With James Marsters.

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: (1994) Comedy starring Joe Mantegna, Joe Pantoliano and Brian Haley. Inept criminals kidnap a millionaire's baby. But when the boy escapes, there's mayhem as they try to track him down.

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: (2021) Heartfelt fact-based comedy-drama. Kevin Hart stars as a widower who is suddenly sprung into single fatherhood after his wife dies a day after giving birth.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: (2016) Sci-fi blockbuster sequel starring Jeff Goldblum. Twenty years after Earth repelled a devastating alien invasion, the extraterrestrials return to finish the job.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the coaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: (1999) The Muppets are back in another feature-length adventure as Gonzo, convinced that he is of alien origin, struggles to communicate with his family in outer space.

programme.title: The Seeker: The Dark Is Rising
programme.desc: (2007) Supernatural thriller. Alexander Ludwig stars as The Seeker, who has the task of finding six items hidden throughout time, which the scary forces of The Dark are also looking for.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: (2018) Oscar-winning animated superhero adventure with the voices of Shameik Moore, Kathryn Hahn and Nicolas Cage. Can a gang of Spider-heroes save the universe from reality-bending chaos?

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: Dog
programme.desc: (2022) Poignant road-trip comedy with Channing Tatum. A soldier with PTSD must escort a traumatised army canine to a comrade's funeral. Can man and dog save each other's lives?

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: American Woman
programme.desc: (2018) Emotional drama starring Sienna Miller. A woman must raise her grandson after her daughter disappears. With Christina Hendricks and Aaron Paul.

programme.title: You Are Not My Mother
programme.desc: (2021) Excruciatingly eerie family horror about a teenage girl who believes her mother has been swapped out after disappearing for a few days. Are there dark forces at work?

programme.title: The Desert Fox
programme.desc: (1951) Drama. James Mason stars in Henry Hathaway's sympathetic portrait of Field Marshal Erwin Rommel in the final years of his life during the Second World War. With Jessica Tandy.

programme.title: Anastasia
programme.desc: (1956) Historical drama. The Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman stars as an amnesiac refugee who Yul Brynner tries to pass off as the daughter of the murdered Tsar of Russia, Nicholas II.

programme.title: Pool of London
programme.desc: (1951) Classic Ealing thriller filmed in a documentary style, starring Bonar Colleano as a sailor whose smuggling activities lead to him being suspected of murder and going on the run.

programme.title: Rio Grande
programme.desc: (1950) Western. John Wayne plays the commander of a Texan fort at which his ex-wife (Maureen O'Hara) pitches up. Can he win back her love by saving kidnapped children from Apache raiders?

programme.title: Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: (2004) Drama. Dennis Quaid stars as the captain of an aircraft downed in the desert. There's no hope of rescue, unless he and the survivors can build another plane from the wreckage.

programme.title: Top Gun: Maverick
programme.desc: (2022) Danger-zone action as Tom Cruise returns to the cockpit after 36 years. He's Maverick. He still feels the need for speed. And there's a near-impossible mission to fly. With Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Io Capitano

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous
programme.desc: A Week in Provence: With a suitably chosen wardrobe, Edina and Patsy go on holiday to Provence, where they find the language barrier is the least of their problems.

programme.title: Interior Design Masters
programme.desc: The designers fly solo this week, giving them a chance to show off their individual abilities as they transform shepherd huts into boutique boltholes on a glampsite in north Wales.

programme.desc: Who Will Buy?: Brilliant surreal comedy with the masterful Richard Wilson. Mystery ensues when Victor digs out his ventriloquist's dummy - and finds it promptly banished by Margaret.

programme.title: One Foot in the Grave
programme.desc: The Secret of the Seven Sorcerers: Victor's conjuring group runs into trouble when a trick goes horribly wrong. And his new job as a lollipop man prompts calls from the fire brigade.

programme.title: The Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: A Reformed Character?: Fred Dibnah becomes the stepfather of two boys and resolves to make concessions in his second marriage - but insists that the oily cap stays. Ep5

programme.title: The Fred Dibnah Story
programme.desc: Approaching Sixty: The former steeplejack and renowned engineering expert looks back on his eventful life with a sense of satisfaction and contentment. Ep6

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Made in Britain

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Age of Steam
programme.desc: Driving the Wheels of Industry: Fred Dibnah looks at the extraordinary expansion of industrial Britain in the 18th century.

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Age of Steam

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Age of Steam

programme.title: Fred Dibnah's Age of Steam
